Text:
Like we know, last year the assholes and dickheads of TTVK monitored the finnish downloaders of the original "kun valaistun" -album and then blackmailed 67 of them to pay. Something that can be compared to fascism and mafia. 
I want to assure that this torrent is uploaded from a foreign IP and has nothing to do with TTVK-faggots (who should suck cock anyway)
 Happy downloading :D Culture belongs to everybody, for free.
miten piratismiin tulisi suhtautua ja miksi se todellisuudessa hyödyttää koko yhteiskuntaa?  ks. ahtoapajalahti.fi/jokapiraatinoikeus.pdf

A big thanks to the uploader!
@anonyymipiraatti: That sucks! Fortunately I'm downloading the album from Greece, so TTVK can do nothing to me ;)
